title: Innovative Integration of XR-Based Art Practice and Language Education: Immersive Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool proficiency and artistic practice experience
context.additional_context: Project-based course combining arts education (theater, film) and language learning with XR platforms in a BYOD environment: Responds to post-COVID-19 demand for non-face-to-face education while applying socioconstructivist learning principles

learning_goals: Learners collaboratively design a 10-minute digital performance scenario with three or more peers using virtual collaboration tools in an XR environment
Learners perform impromptu acting for over 5 minutes in an immersive VR/AR environment in the target language (Korean/English) and exchange feedback
Learners develop three microlearning contents integrating art practice and language learning using XR content creation tools in a BYOD environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
